text: Alfred Kolleritsch (16 February 1931 - 29 May 2020) was an Austrian people journalist, poet and philosopher. He was born in Eichfeld, Austria. He was the founder of the literary magazine manuscripts. He was the President of the Forum Stadtpark, a cultural center in Graz. Kolleritsch died on 29 May 2020 in Graz, aged 89.Alfred Kolleritsch ist tot ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Austrian journalists Category:Austrian poets Category:Austrian philosophers
title: Alfred Kolleritsch
